product_definition.tagline: Professional paranormal investigation toolkit with authentic audio analysis
product_definition.mission_statement: Provide paranormal investigators with professional-grade EVP recording and analysis tools that focus on authentic audio processing rather than entertainment features.

target_audience.primary: Serious paranormal investigators and ghost hunting enthusiasts
target_audience.secondary: Audio professionals requiring anomaly detection capabilities

user_personas.name: Professional Investigator
user_personas.description: Experienced ghost hunter who uses multiple investigation tools and wants reliable, accurate equipment

user_personas.name: Hobbyist Explorer
user_personas.description: Paranormal enthusiast who wants legitimate tools but may be newer to investigation techniques

mvp_features.name: Professional Audio Recording
mvp_features.description: High-quality audio capture with optimized settings for EVP investigation
user_stories: As an investigator, I want to record audio at professional quality so I can detect subtle anomalies
As a user, I want optimized microphone settings so I don't miss potential EVP captures

mvp_features.name: Real-Time Anomaly Detection
mvp_features.description: Automatic identification and marking of audio spikes, frequency anomalies, and unusual patterns
technical_requirements: Real-time FFT analysis for frequency domain processing
Spike detection algorithms with configurable sensitivity
Automatic timestamp marking for detected anomalies
Visual waveform display with anomaly highlighting
user_stories: As an investigator, I want automatic anomaly detection so I don't miss potential EVP events
As a user, I want timestamps marked automatically so I can quickly review interesting sections

mvp_features.name: Session Review and Tagging
mvp_features.description: Comprehensive playback interface with manual tagging and annotation capabilities
technical_requirements: Manual tag creation with custom labels and notes
Audio segment isolation and loop playback
Waveform zoom and detailed analysis view
user_stories: As an investigator, I want to review flagged segments so I can validate potential EVP captures
As a user, I want to add my own tags and notes so I can document my findings

mvp_features.name: Export and Reporting
mvp_features.description: Professional export options for audio clips and analysis reports
technical_requirements: WAV/FLAC export for high-quality audio preservation
PDF/CSV report generation with session details
Metadata preservation for timestamps and tags
user_stories: As a professional investigator, I want to export findings in professional formats for evidence documentation
As a team member, I want to share specific audio segments with colleagues for review

premium_features.name: Advanced Spectral Analysis
premium_features.description: Detailed frequency domain analysis with spectrograms and advanced filtering
premium_features.justification: Professional investigators value detailed analysis tools, differentiates from basic recording apps

premium_features.name: Cloud Session Management
premium_features.description: Cross-device sync and cloud storage for investigation sessions
premium_features.justification: Teams and frequent investigators need reliable backup and sharing capabilities

premium_features.name: Unlimited Recording Length
premium_features.description: Remove time restrictions on recording sessions
premium_features.justification: Professional investigations often require extended recording periods

premium_features.name: Batch Analysis Tools
premium_features.description: Process multiple recordings simultaneously with batch anomaly detection
premium_features.justification: Advanced users with multiple sessions need efficient processing workflow

steps: Begin recording with real-time waveform monitoring
End session and proceed to review
View overview with detected anomaly timestamps
Tap anomaly marker to jump to timestamp
Listen to flagged audio segment in isolation
Add manual tag with classification and notes
Move to next anomaly or add custom markers
Select reviewed session with tagged anomalies
Choose export format (audio clips, full session, report)
Generate and share via standard iOS/Android sharing
Save to cloud storage if premium subscriber

information_architecture.session_organization: Chronological list with location, duration, and anomaly count metadata

permissions_required: Optional: Location access for session metadata

recording_specs.format: WAV for processing, compressed storage options

analysis_algorithms.anomaly_detection: FFT-based frequency analysis with configurable threshold detection
analysis_algorithms.noise_reduction: Adaptive filtering to reduce background interference
analysis_algorithms.real_time_processing: Streaming analysis with minimal latency impact

data_management.local_storage: SQLite for session metadata, file system for audio
data_management.cloud_integration: Optional premium sync with major cloud providers

differentiators: Focus on authentic analysis over entertainment features
Professional-grade audio processing and export capabilities
Automated anomaly detection with timestamp precision
Clean, distraction-free interface designed for serious investigators
competitive_advantages: No fake sounds or prerecorded content
Advanced audio analysis typically found in desktop software
Professional export formats for evidence documentation
Subscription model supports ongoing development and feature updates
